S

sendHandshake() - Method in class goClient.GoClient
Handles the client-server handshake, according to the protocol This method sends the handshake and checks whether the server response is valid If the response is not valid, this method throws a ProtocolException.
sendMessage(String) - Method in class goClient.GoClient
Sends a message to the connected server, followed by a new line.
sendMessage(String) - Method in class goServer.GoClientHandler
Sends a message to the connected client, followed by a new line.
sendQuit() - Method in class goClient.GoClient
Sends a message to the server indicating that this client will exit: ProtocolMessages.EXIT; Both the server and the client then close the connection.
ServerUnavailableException - Exception in exceptions
Exception to indicate that server is unavailable.

Starts creating a connection, followed by the handshake as defined in the protocol.

Starts TUI (thread): asks for user input continuously and handles communication accordingly using the GoTUI.handleUserInput(String input) method.

Strategy - Interface in goComputerAI

surroundedOwn(int) - Method in class goGame.BoardTools
Check if this stone is surrounded by own stones (above, right, below and left).
surroundedOwnRecursive(int) - Method in class goGame.BoardTools
Check if this stone is surrounded by own stones (above, right, below and left), ignoring already checked stones IN THE CURRENT FOUND GROUP.
